section.name: Changelog
section.p: A short description of changes is given for each release

ul.li: Fix for bug that prevented proper usage of more than one concurrent instance of the module (reference to cache was static).
Refactored JUnit test to use a decorator for initialization.
JavaDocs & code conventions.
Added module property 'useRootForNullPath' (see JavaDoc).
Fixed bug that would leave the children (getChildren()) of an item unfiltered.
Wrote JUnitTest to verify this behaviour in the future.
Fixed bug that would leave the children (getChildren()) of an item unfiltered.
Wrote JUnitTest to verify this behaviour in the future.
Added childs to MenuItem
Added AttributeEnabledObject interface
Added Attributes to MenuFilters
Made abstract MenuFilter
Changed MenuItem to implement AttributeEnebledObject
deprecated MenuModule.getAttribute() for a cleaner method with the same name
Removed Commons BeanUtils/ Commons Collections dependency in favor of Ognl
changed parameters from Properties to Map for velocity
removed the url encoding which was probably overkill and was killing parnassays
fixed parameter element to always be included not just when there was a ? in the link
added dtd for the xml , dtd is not yet enforced by the code
replaced setQueryString in MenuItem with new request parameter structure
it is now possible to add xml element parameter (equal to attribute) to specify parameters for the url
getQueryString now returns dynamicly build String dependend on the request parameters
added url encoding to the parameters
Moved class TreeStateCache from OpenEdge Util to this project, package: nl.openedge.modules.impl.menumodule
Cleaned up dependencies.
First production release.
